"use client" import { useState } from "react" import { X } from "lucide-react" import "./Modal.css" const MoveTaskModal = ({ isOpen, onClose, onMove, lists, currentListId, taskTitle }) => { const [selectedListId, setSelectedListId] = useState("") const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false) if (!isOpen) return null const filteredLists = lists.filter((list) => list.id !== currentListId) const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (!selectedListId) return setIsSubmitting(true) await onMove(selectedListId) setSelectedListId("") setIsSubmitting(false) } return (

Move Task to Another List

{filteredLists.length === 0 ? (

No other lists available. Create a new list first.

) : ( )}
) } export default MoveTaskModal;
